TopicTitle: Space plane capable of flight without engine.

Articles.Content:
I came up with an idea that I would be able to create a plane that will fly without any engines. It was pretty easy actually it may not be the most impressive aircraft but I thought it was cool.

I am not sure how to get the pictures to work here, but here is the link to the album http://imgur.com/a/OHX9j#0

I was able to generate enough speed to achieve and maintain flight by just repeatedly tapping the S key.

Link to download. https://docs.google.com/open?id=0B3bMepfmvHAONnpYc1lZUzVwUUU
